wikipedia_page.main: Michelle McIlveen MLA (born 21 January 1971) is a unionist politician from Northern Ireland. She was elected to the Northern Ireland Assembly as a Democratic Unionist Party member for Strangford in 2007. She has been the Minister for Education since June 2021 and General Secretary of the DUP since 2008.

response: | style="background:" |     || Michelle McIlveen|| 60px ||   || 21 September 2015 || 6 May 2016Resigned on 21 September 2015, re-entered office on 23 Sept. till 24 Sept., then 30 Sept.-1 Oct. 2015. Following the 20 October she permanently occupies the office

The Department of Education (DENI) (; Ulster-Scots: Männystrie o Lear)Depairtment o Leir is also used by the North/South Ministerial Council. is a devolved Northern Irish government department in the Northern Ireland Executive.  The minister with overall responsibility for the department is the Minister of Education. The current Minister of Education is Michelle McIlveen as of 14 June 2021.
